mapper.insert: insert into tb_radio_audio (name, url, cover, duration, create_time, sync_flag, band,coverKey,radioName) values (#{name},#{url}, #{cover},#{duration},#{createDate},#{sync_flag},#{band},#{coverKey},#{radioName})
mapper.select: select * from tb_radio_audio audio where audio.name = #{name} and audio.band = #{band}
select * from tb_radio_audio audio where audio.sync_flag != 'Y' limit #{start},#{pageSize}
